pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ—
